Sudoku Reader Module

class sudoku_reader.SudokuReader(filename)[source]

Handles the reading of a sudoku board from a text file and initialising a sudoku board as a list of lists for further processing

read_board_from_file(filename)[source]

Reads a sudoku puzzle from a text file and converts it into a list of lists where each sublist represents a row of the sudoku.

Parameters:

filename (str) – Path to the text file containing the sudoku puzzle.

Returns:

A 2D list representing each row of the initial sudoku board.

Return type:

list[list[str]]

Raises:

ValueError – If the file is not found, invalid or is empty.
